description:
The memorable first episode with cat ears! At work, you must add a “meow” at the end of your sentences!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Derella G Guest Da Nya / Zutto Kagameteitai / Hyakujuu no Ou wa Zenryoku de
Our Derella G Guest / Let Me Keep Gazing at It / The King of Beast Goes All-Out
デレラジゲストだにゃ / ずっと眺めていたい / 百獣の王は全力で
